title: Get TheBlaze: Comcast Lobbying | "Glenn Beck Radio Program"
description: Stu discusses the lobbying efforts of Comcast in its attempt to merge with Time Warner Cable. Make your voice heard — Tell the FCC you don't think Comcast's crony capitalism is in the best...
